original_text: And the Lord God caused a deep sleep to fall upon Adam, and he slept: and he took one of his ribs, and closed up the flesh instead thereof;
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이 아담을 깊이 잠들게 하시니 잠들매 그가 그 갈빗대 하나를 취하고 살로 대신 채우시고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord God caused a deep sleep to fall upon Adam
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 아담에게 깊은 잠이 들게 하시고

sentences.original_text: and he took one of his ribs
and closed up the flesh instead thereof
